did.unittitle: Terminal Report of the President's Steel Fact-Finding Board
did.abstract: Terminal Report of the President's Steel Fact-Finding Board, submitted February 25, 1946.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The President's Steel Fact-Finding Board was appointed in the dispute between the steel producing subsidiaries of the United States Steel Corporation and the United Steelworkers of America, CIO. President Harry S. Truman appointed the board on December 31, 1945.
Roger I. McDonough, James M. Douglas, and Nathan P. Feinsinger (chair) served on the board.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the terminal Report of the President's Steel Fact-Finding Board, submitted February 25, 1946.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
